org.openimaj.demos.campusview

Interface CaptureControlsDelegate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CampusView

    public interface CaptureControlsDelegate
    Interface describing a delegate for the capture controls.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
